text: The 1928 TCU Horned Frogs football team represented Texas Christian University (TCU) in the 1928 college football season. The Horned Frogs finished the season 8–2 overall and 3–2 in the Southwest Conference. The team was coached by Matty Bell in his sixth and final year as head coach. The Frogs played their home games at Clark Field, which was located on campus in Fort Worth, Texas. ==Schedule== ==References== TCU Category:TCU Horned Frogs football seasons TCU Horned Frogs football
title: 1928 TCU Horned Frogs football team
